name: Hampton Inn & Suites Saratoga Springs

reviews.title: A little lacking on the details
reviews.text: Yes, this is a new property, so it feels clean and special. But, it also feels like it was assembled together too quickly. The carpeting in my room did not line up to the wall, so you could see the cracked concrete underneath. The tiling in the main dining area is crooked. These are little things, I know, but they tell a story about the greater care of the property.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The staff put me in a room right next to the ice machine, which was actually fairly loud. I noticed rooms on other floors were also booked here, but the property wasn't sold out that night, so I wasn't sure why there were inflicting this inconvenience on guests.
reviews.title: Perfect!

reviews.text: Add some time to your day for just getting to/from the car, as the parking area isn't particularly convenient, especially if you will have more than one trip.
reviews.title: The best Hampton Inn I've been to

reviews.text: I dunno -- when you book a Hampton, you expect certain conveniences. This one seems to have moved away from those conveniences, but you do get a fancy schmancy lobby. I don't know about you, but I would rather have a quiet, comfortable room, since I'm never going to be in the lobby except for check in.
reviews.title: Mr.

reviews.text: We stayed here for one night in early September and found the hotel to be perfect. The staff were very friendly, there were good parking facilities and it was very well located. The room was huge, exceptionally clean and looked brand new! Ticks all round! We were greeted warmly by the staff and you could tell that they take pride in their hotel and want to help where they can. We had a corner room which was huge!! Lovely big flat screen TV and large bathroom (no tub but that did not matter to us). Breakfast was included and it was lovely - hot and cold options and presented well. The only thing I thought odd was that they used paper plates and plastic cutlery - this did not matter to us at all as the hotel and breakfast area was lovely but because the hotel was so well presented it didn't seem to fit the ambience if that makes sense. This may well be to keep costs down. I would definitely stay again and recommend to others. You can certainly tell why the hotel consistently gets such good reviews and well deserved they are too! Saratoga Springs on the whole is a lovely place.
reviews.title: Perfect Stay!

reviews.text: Went to a concert and stayed the night. This Hampton is the most upscale we have seen. Should be 5 star rated because it truly is. The breakfast offering was as upscale as the beautiful facility. We will definitely stay here whenever we are in the area. This is without a doubt the top facility in the Saratoga area.
reviews.title: An outstanding experience

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Tom C
reviews.title: Top notch experience

reviews.text: Naples, FL
reviews.title: One of my favorite Hampton Inns

reviews.text: This is an upscale Hampton Inn and is convenient to downtown. Parking is free so you can leave your car and walk the one block to Broadway and shopping/dining. Our room was huge and had plenty of closet space and seating areas and good lighting. Couldn't believe we were the only ones in the pool and hottub on a Friday afternoon/evening. Nice workout room that overlooks the pool with working machines plus free weights and medicine balls. Breakfast was good with a great selection of cereal, plus the usual waffles, eggs, sausage, etc. A great farmer's market is less than a block away too (open on Saturdays and a weekday). The staff and hotel in general seemed much warmer than another hotel I stayed at a few months ago for business. Only negative was the thin, worn bathmat in an otherwise nice bathroom.
reviews.title: Excellent Stay

reviews.text: I have stayed at this Hampton a number of times. I usually come to town once a year, and it's the only place I want to stay. Rooms are nice, beds are comfy. I had a balcony room one year, loved that. Had lunch on the balcony a couple of days.
reviews.title: Lovely Hotel In Ideal Location

reviews.text: This hotle was wonderful. I had no idea that the Hampton Inn & Suites would be so nice and offer the comforts and amenities as a 5 star hotle. I was pleasantly suprised and will definitely make the Hampton Inn & Suites my first choice when looking for accomodations
reviews.title: Hampton Inn & Suites
Awesome hotel!
reviews.text: This hotel was beautiful! It also was super convenient to everything in Saratoga, Springs. Our hotel room was large & very spacious for our family. It also had very nice patio that we spent many evenings hanging out & planning our dinner destination. The Hampton also had a wonderful free breakfast & coffee. I had one morning when one of the wonderful staff helped me make one of there delightful waffles. I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone considering hotels in Saratoga, Springs.

I understand why this hotel consistently receives great reviews! We were thinking about staying at some of the other more expensive hotels in Saratoga Springs; however, based on the reviews we decided to stay at the Hampton and the hotel exceeded our expectations.The location is excellent, the rooms are ultra clean and spacious and the service is first class. The breakfast in the morning offers a nice selection of hot and cold items and the staff was friendly and attentive in making sure the food was replenished. We reserved a room with a balcony and it was definitely worth the extra few dollars. The balcony was spacious with a nice roundtable and four chairs which we used each evening for our happy hour. Parking was easy and always plenty of spaces. Due to the location we were able to easily walk to the restaurants and shops in the downtown area. Overall, a wonderful experience, great value for the dollar and we will definitely be back.
reviews.title: An Outstanding Hotel!

reviews.text: We took our 10 yr old daughter to a concert in Saratoga Springs, I booked this hotel cause I read all of the good reviews, and I we loved it. My daughter wants to go back to this hotel. the breakfast was excellent, customer service 5 stars, parking is free, the modern look of the hotel is attractive. We don't have anything bad to say about this hotel, if you are reading all the reviews and trying to decide whether to stay here or not, please book your stay here. you'll love it.
reviews.title: loved it.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Hotel is very nice and the location is perfect but does not offset the Gov rate discontinue policy during racing. They can get the extremely high rates (supply and demand) and they do! No relief for 100% disabled vets at this hotel...........RPB
reviews.title: Rates too high during racing season

reviews.text: Always an excellent choice. Been staying there for many years. Clean hotel, very attentive staff, located close to all attractions in Saratoga Springs. Comfortable lounges for breakfast and just hanging out .
reviews.title: Hampton Inn & Suites Saratoga Springs NY

reviews.text: Always enjoy our stay here.
reviews.title: Good option in Saratoga Springs

reviews.text: This is a high end Hampton, upscale and better than the typical highway side places. Ive found the downtown Hamptons tend to be quite nice overall and this one fit that mold pretty well. Very nice lobby, homey and well decorated to the local culture of S. Springs. Room was good, comfortable, met the needs well.
reviews.title: great hotel! great location!

reviews.text: Prices were high, location makes it worth it as you can pretty much walk to multitudes of rambunctious places to drink or nice places to dine.
reviews.title: Excellent hotel, walk to downtown

reviews.text: Front desk staff friendly but lines can be long if your there at a busy time to check in.
reviews.title: Beautiful property

aka: Hampton Inn & Suites Saratoga Springs Hotel Saratoga Springs
